title: The Innocent Incubus And The Sinful Priest
alternative_title: Furachi na Shinpu to Pure Inma ; 不埒な神父とピュア淫魔
status: Furachi na Shinpu to Pure Inma ; 不埒な神父とピュア淫魔
description:
Description :
        "There is nothing more attractive than a lustful incubus trying to hold themselves back...!" Dive into a delightful fantasy BL tale where a playboy priest and a devoted, pure-hearted incubus find themselves entangled in a sweet and spicy romance! Noa, an incubus determined to safeguard his chastity, believes in reserving oneself for true love. Seeking to purge himself of his sinful desires, he seeks solace in a church, hoping for exorcism. However, the priest who greets him is irresistibly enticing! "If you can resist temptation, I'll exorcise your desires," Noa had come to rid himself to these feelings only to find himself...?! All his pent-up desire came exploding out?!
